channel.title: Iphone 4 - Jailbreak? {yes} {no}
channel.description: Is it safe to jailbreak the iPhone 4? I bought my iPhone from another person, and got a sim card to put in it. I own the phone and i have a cheap contract. Will i lose the unlock for the phone if i jailbreak it? Version: 6.0.1

item.title: Iphone 4 - Jailbreak? {yes} {no}
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

As of right mow there isn’t and untethered jailbreak for iOS6, meaning you lose jailbreak when you reboot. You could always downgrade to 5.1.1 though.

Read full topic

item.title: Iphone 4 - Jailbreak? {yes} {no}
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:4, topic:480803”][quote author=Kodiak link=topic=599040.msg4211388#msg4211388 date=1359589704]
its safe but ive done it and its pointless

tl;dr dont bother wasting the time of day
[/quote]
Pointless?

Free apps, tethering, etc.[/quote]

i guess im just speaking from my experience, half the jb apps didnt work for me, and the normal app store was corrupted for me after jb installation

Read full topic

item.title: Iphone 4 - Jailbreak? {yes} {no}
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:3, topic:480803”]its safe but ive done it and its pointless

tl;dr dont bother wasting the time of day[/quote]

I personally don’t think its useless unless you have an extremely old iPhone (original/3g/3gs), as it’ll more than likely cause your iPhone to crash quite often, lag, and reboot itself randomly, well at least for my iPhone 3g, but than again I have iOS 4.2.1 installed on it, well, i think, not 100% as I rarely use it now a days since I have a galaxy s3.

Just remember to restore it back to factory settings and all if anything happens and you’re forced to bring it into a phone store, or it’ll void your warranty and I doubt you’d want to spend >$500-700 for a brand new iPhone.

Read full topic

item.title: Iphone 4 - Jailbreak? {yes} {no}
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

My jailbreak keeps draining my battery… If I leave my iPod at 100% for 12 hours, it will drain to around 60 - 70% without me touching it.

Read full topic

item.title: Iphone 4 - Jailbreak? {yes} {no}
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:4, topic:480803”][quote author=Kodiak link=topic=599040.msg4211388#msg4211388 date=1359589704]
its safe but ive done it and its pointless

tl;dr dont bother wasting the time of day
[/quote]
Pointless?

Free apps, tethering, etc.[/quote]
summed it up. not pointless, do it. but i don’t think that there is a public jailbreak for 6.0.1

Read full topic
